title: This upstairs 2x2 is a Great choice!
posting_body: Fabulous 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment with a private balcony and outside storage room.
The apartment itself has great upgrades, and plenty of closet storage and cabinets!
These apartment homes have lush garden settings and overlook the Santa Teresa foothills.
They are very private and serene.
Our lovely community is under rent control too and a management team that is friendly & caring!
Visit our Website for more information: <URL>/
* well designed kitchen to include all appliances
* 13 x 20" living rooms with extra coat closet
We are close to everything you will need; farmers markets, restaurants, library, schools, local shopping, VTA bus/ light rail and freeway access all just blocks away
Be Smart - Come see how we can help you find your new home, not just a place to live.
We are located in the best South Bay location along the quiet edge of the South San Jose foothills next to some of the finest Santa Clara County scenic biking and hiking trails in the Silicon Valley.
Call for your personal tour of your new home today!
Our office hours are Monday - Saturday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Dogs must be no larger than 25 lbs.
Pet restrictions and additional deposit and rent may apply.
All rents, deposits, availability and other lease terms are subject to change without notice.
Please call us for current rental rates, availability, deposits and leasing terms.
